name: QScript Full Syntax
content:
// This example demonstrates full syntax of QScript.
 //
 
 // Variables are automatically declared on first assignment.
 j = 100
 // Type of variables is determined like in JavaScript.
 s = "Value: "
 
 // For loop.
 for i = 0; i < 10; i++
   if i == 3
     continue
   endif
   if i == 5
     break
   endif
   Print j * i
 endfor
 
 // If..Else..Endif statement.
 if j < 300
   Print "j < 300"
 else
   Print "j >= 300"
 endif
 
 // Procedure.
 proc MyProc x, y
     // Procedures can be nested.
   proc NestedProc z
     if z == "Value: 2"
             // Variables starting with underscore have global scope.
       _return_value = "quantum"
       return
     endif
     _return_value = z + "."
   endproc
   // Variables have scope local to the procedure.
   for i = x; i < y; i++
       NestedProc s + i
     Print _return_value
   endfor
 endproc
 
 _return_value = ""
 
 MyProc 2, 5
 Print _return_value
